odd.head: General Note
odd.p: DVD includes: full length documentary; additional scenes; personal insights. Featured sections: dance; Mother India; temples; personal interviews; Mother Theresa; deleted scenes; Flavors of India event; production photo album. Booklet includes sections on business, medicine, celebrations and weddings, spirituality, cuisine, and going home.

archdesc.scopecontent: Captured in faith, family and fortune, Michigan's Indian American population is explored in colorful detail throughout Our India story. The film features interviews with prominent Indian Americans and follows their footsteps through challenges and boom times and celebrates their assimilation into the world of medicine, business and religion. Some segments were filmed during a visit to India to rejoice in the essential Indian zest for life--Container.
